abstract: Sigrid Agren is transformed with makeup by Pat McGrath and hair by Guido Palau.
snippet: Sigrid Agren is transformed with makeup by Pat McGrath and hair by Guido Palau.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Greg Kessler captures the transformations of Paris Fashion Week. Here, the model Sigrid Agren from Ford Model Management before (left) and after (right) transforms, with makeup by Pat McGrath and hair by Guido Palau for Redken. (Drag the orange bar left to reveal the full transformation.)
